name: Metadata Swarm Mass
backstory: A swirling mass of stolen metadata fragments. It whispers secrets it has collected - names, addresses, transaction histories. It feeds on exposed information and grows stronger with every privacy violation. It speaks in fragmented sentences, often revealing embarrassing truths about its victims.

special.description: Splits into multiple attacks hitting all heroes for reduced damage

name: Open Ledger Golem
backstory: A massive construct built from transparent ledger pages. Every transaction ever made is inscribed on its crystalline body for all to see. It believes total transparency is the only path to truth, and sees privacy as a form of deception. It speaks in formal, proclamatory tones like reading legal documents aloud.

special.description: Reveals hero positions, reducing their AC by 3 for 2 turns
Immobilizes target hero for 1 turn, preventing all actions
Attacks the same target twice in one turn
Creates obscuring dust, giving all heroes disadvantage on next attack
Ensnares target, reducing their speed by half for 2 turns
Studies hero movements, gaining +5 to hit next turn
Attacks all heroes in close proximity for 75% damage each
Marks a hero, making them vulnerable to +50% damage for 2 turns
Attacks bounce between heroes, hitting up to 3 targets
Delays a hero's next turn by 1 initiative slot
Reveals hidden hero stats, granting advantage on attacks against them
Cannot miss attacks for 1 turn, ignoring AC entirely
Shatters hero's defense, reducing AC by 5 for 2 turns
Raises AC by 4 and reflects 20% damage back to attacker for 2 turns
Reads hero abilities, copying one random ability for use
Locks a hero's special ability, preventing use for 2 turns
Attacks 3 random heroes simultaneously for 60% damage each
Divides into two halves, each attacking separately at 50% damage
Commits to attacking one hero, dealing double damage but taking +50% from others
